snp1.12:7.5: Padmaṁva → padumaṁva (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | alippamānaṁ → alimpamānaṁ (sya-all, mr)
snp1.12:10.2: Daharo majjhimo ca muni → daharo ca majjhimo ca munī (bj); daharo ca majjho ca munī (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1)
snp1.12:10.3: na so roseti → so na roseti (bj, pts-vp-pli1); na roseti (sya-all)
